title: The technology of translation
description: What is the relationship between translation, technology and the human brain?

vocabItems.definition: metaphorway of describing a person or thing by comparing it to something else, often found in poetry and literatureIt's raining cats and dogs!(idiom) It is raining heavily!chunka large part of somethingrotelearnt by memory in order to be repeated rather than properly understoodautomateddone by machines instead of humansflummoxconfuse someone so much that they don't know what to do
